sentences.en: A close analogy with the art of singing can be made.
sentences.cn: 可以用歌唱艺术作类比.

sentences.en: analogies between human and animal behaviour
sentences.cn: 人类行为与动物行为的类同

sentences.en: It is not always reliable to argue by analogy.
sentences.cn: 靠类推法论证并不总是可靠的.

sentences.en: It is probably easier to make an analogy between the courses of the planets, and two trains travelling in the same direction.
sentences.cn: 将行星的运行比作两列火车朝同一方向行驶可能更容易些。

sentences.en: My theory applies to you and by analogy to others like you.
sentences.cn: 我的理论适用于你,照此类推,也适用于像你这样的其他人.

sentences.en: She drew an analogy between childbirth and the creative process.
sentences.cn: 她将分娩和创造过程进行类比。

sentences.en: The analogy between Auschwitz and Oak Ridge seems forced.
sentences.cn: 奥斯威辛和橡树岭之间的相似之处似乎是牵强附会的.

sentences.en: The analogy between music and fragrance has stuck.
sentences.cn: 音乐与香味的类比已经深入人心了。
这个比方有点驴唇不对马嘴.

sentences.en: The teacher drew an analogy between the human heart and a pump.
sentences.cn: 老师打了个比喻，把人的心脏比作水泵。

sentences.en: There is a close analogy between the gills of a fish and the lungs of a mammal.
sentences.cn: 鱼的鳃与哺乳动物的肺很相似.

sentences.en: There is an analogy between the way water moves in waves and the way light travels.
sentences.cn: 水的波动与光的运行有类似之处.

sentences.en: They say " thunk " on the analogy of'sunk ".
sentences.cn: 他们根据 thunk 类推而说 sunk.

sentences.en: This case is not on all fours with the other one, so no analogy can be drawn between them.
sentences.cn: 这件案子与那件案子不完全相符.

sentences.en: This classification is the analogy of our previous picture of stable orbits.
sentences.cn: 这种区分类似于前面的稳定轨道图形.

sentences.en: This is only by way of analogy.
Trace an analogy between pastoral poetry and landscape painting.
sentences.cn: 找出田园诗和风景画之间的相似之处.
